articles.title: 5 Budgeting Lies That Kept Me Broke for Years (Despite Following All the 'Expert' Advice)
articles.author: Marcus Johnson
articles.description: I followed all the personal finance advice—and still overdrafted every month. After 3 years of budgeting 'failures,' I discovered the 5 lies that kept me broke and the simple truths that finally worked.

articles.title: Grocery Store Hacks: 15 Ways to Save Big on Your Weekly Shopping Trip (I Cut My Bill by 47%)
articles.author: David Kim
articles.description: Your habits matter more than coupons. After spending $180/week on groceries for two people, I used these 15 smart tricks to cut my bill to $95/week without sacrificing quality or variety.

articles.title: No-Cook Budget Meals for When You're Too Tired to Cook (or Don't Have a Stove): 7 Lifesaving Recipes Under $3 Each
articles.author: Maria Santos
articles.description: Whether it's heat, laziness, or no kitchen — this is your fix. After 3 months with a broken stove and a $50/week food budget, here are 7 no-cook meals that saved my sanity and wallet.

articles.id: articles/7-Day Budget Meal Plan for Under $50
articles.image: assets/images/7-Day Budget Meal Plan for Under $50.jpg
articles.title: 7-Day Budget Meal Plan for Under $50 (I Ate This for 3 Months When Money Was Tight)
articles.author: Maria Santos
articles.description: Grocery prices are insane, but you can still eat well on $50/week. This is the exact meal plan I used for 3 months when money was tight—real recipes, real prices, real food that doesn't taste like punishment.

articles.id: articles/Top 10 Cheapest Grocery Items That Stretch Across Multiple Meals
articles.image: assets/images/Top 10 Cheapest Grocery Items That Stretch Across Multiple Meals.jpg
articles.title: Top 10 Cheapest Grocery Items That Stretch Across Multiple Meals (I Fed Myself for $6/Day Using These)
articles.author: Carlos Rivera
articles.description: Stop buying expensive groceries that only make one meal. These 10 ingredients cost under $3 each but can create dozens of different meals. I tested every one during my broke college years.
